# cloudflare_workers_route (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudflare_workers_route" "example_workers_route" {
  zone_id = "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353"
  route_id = "023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353"
}
```
